refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o buzz.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kcps = 110 ifn = 1
knh line p4, p3, p5 asig buzz 1, kcps, knh, ifn outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
;sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
i 1 0 3 20 20 i 1 + 3 3 3 i 1 + 3 10 1 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
